name: insert_chars_basic
description: CSI Ps @ (Insert Characters) shifts existing content right at cursor position
comment: Print ABCDE at (0,0)-(0,4). CUP(1,2) to (0,1). CSI 2 @ inserts 2 blanks at (0,1), shifting BCDE right. Grid becomes A__BCDE (within 8 cols). Print X at (0,1), cursor advances to (0,2).
